item.description:
Another movie meetup! The movie starts at 3:40pm.  It is suggested that everyone buy their tickets in advance in case the movie gets sold out.  Here is a link to Fandango:
http://www.fandango.com/thedarkknightrises_135740/movietimes?location=02210&date=7/28/2012

We'll meet up in the lobby 15 to 20 minutes before show time and then head up to the theater to find seats.

After the movie, we'll head over to the Red Hat (9 Bowdoin St, upstairs) for food & drink. If you can't make it to the movie, feel free to meet us there (probably around 7:00pm).

BTW, Batman is Dick Cheney with hair.
http://www.nypost.com/p/news/opinion/opedcolumnists/item_ghiJuNACcIe5BxqDX7vKjJ

This event has also been posted to Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/events/367530339983702/
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the lobby and then head up to the theater to find seats. My cell is (617) 784-7764
item.name: Movie Meetup: The Dark Knight Rises
